Colombia: Pedro Messía de la Cerda is Viceroy of New Granada
India:
The Marathas are routed in the Third Battle of Panipat on 14 January 1761, by the Afghans led by Ahmad Shah Durrani, also known as Ahmad Shah Abdali. The battle is considered one of the largest battles fought in the 18th century.
The Sukerchakia Misl of Dal Khalsa (Sikh Empire) defeats the Durrani Empire in the Battle of Sialkot (1761)
The Sikh Confederacy defeats the Durrani Empire in the Battle of Gujranwala (1761)
Philippine: Archbishop Manuel Rojo del Rio y Vieyra of Manila appointed Governor-General (1761–1762).
Russia: Miracle of the House of Brandenburg: Elizabeth died. Her nephew, Peter III, became tsar.
Spain: Seven Years' War: Spain declared war on Great Britain.
